title: Model Collapse: When AI Trains on AI
description: A quick, practical guide to Model Collapse: When AI Trains on AI.

hook.text: The internet fills with AI text. New models train on it. Quality spirals downward.

buildup.text: Model collapse happens when generative models train on data produced by earlier models.

discovery.text: Each generation amplifies errors and narrows diversityâ€”like a photocopy of a photocopy.

twist.text: Without fresh human-generated data, future models may degrade rather than improve.

climax.text: Solutions: curate human-only data, label synthetic content, and diversify training sources.

punchline.text: AI eating AI output. The ouroboros of data.

quiz.question: What causes model collapse?
options: Training on AI-generated data from earlier models
